txt.en: Destroy the dark stones to gain entrance to the inner hall of Nimrond.
Destroy the dark stones to gain entrance to the inner hall of Nimrond ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Drugât and Nerzus can be found in the innermost chamber of Nimrond.\n\nDefeat Drugât and Nerzus, leaders of the ruthless dead and Orkish forces.
'Drugât had strayed far from redemption. I doubt we shall see him wander among the living again.'
Arvaethor asks for you to follow him to the very heart of the caverns, deep inside the mountain.
The Hall of Nimrond stands before you, crawling with the Dead
Delve to the deepest chamber of the caverns of Nimrond

'The Ruthless Dead have begun to amass their forces, for what purpose, I know not. Many will die if they march out of the Vale, under cover of these darkened skies. We have made it this far. Perhaps we stand a chance of slaying their leader and leaving their forces without command.\n\n'Come, let us brave the darkness together.'
Delve to the deepest chamber of the caverns of Nimrond.
